statement.p: The delivery of a pump is the amount of fluid supplied per unit of time. This can be calculated as follows.
\displaystyle{D} is pump displacement (in units of cubic inches per revolution)
231 is for unit conversion (in units of cubic inches per gallon)
If a pump displaces \displaystyle{D}={0.41}\ \text{ in}^{{3}}/revolution and is operating at \displaystyle{R}={1482} rotations per minute, what is the output flow of this pump?
